ygData.subject: Re: Interesting naming 'coincidences' found in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen Fabian! I was exploring HK just yesterday & saw him there -- don t remember what room, but I do remember seeing the name! Also, if you tell the NPC
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen Fabian! I was exploring HK just yesterday & saw him
there -- don't remember what room, but I do remember seeing the name!

Also, if you tell the NPC female dwarf (Glorin something-or-other)
who hangs out on the end of the BB docks 'I love you', she will
respond "Glorin & <your name>. We would make a wonderful couple." or
something very similar -- may not have the exact quote right.

Hehe, I loved all of those! I always laugh when I see some of the
weird names, & then consider the 'official naming policy rule' on
joke names -- as if!

Snapdragyn (I haven't died yet today... but the day is still young.)
Gaistyd (Clothes? Who needs clothes?)
